channel.title: OdionX - OldSchool & New
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][font=comic sans ms][i]OdionX[/i][/font][/size][/center]
[center][u][font=comic sans ms][size=14pt]To visit our forums just simply click the link below[/size][/font][/u][/center]
[center][size=10pt][url=http://OdionX.net/forum/]OdionX.net/forum/[/url][/size][/center]
[size=12pt][font=comic sans ms]OdionX is a brand new oldschool server that has no final destination. I have worked on this project for over 2months now and improved it alot. There is lots of OSRS items/bosses & and more to come.
The server does also have "PvP" items such as Statius, Morrigan's, Vesta etc...
Anyway this thread will be updated shortly..[/font][/size]
[font=comic sans ms][size=12pt]Media[/size][/font] [spoiler]Just a few seconds after we went public - [img]https://gyazo.com/ae2fb78296a4e5ac1fd0fa8bf6298e68[/img] Stores - [img]https://gyazo.com/c28d7a7d6225b52c8dbc486469f7a521[/img] [img]https://gyazo.com/401acb6d347dbebe350e0b4821345d91[/img] [img]https://gyazo.com/ac69b188b0e78d081680f86147743cd5[/img] [/spoiler]
[size=12pt][font=comic sans ms]Staff Team[/font][/size] [spoiler][center]Owner/Developer - Mezola Website Developer - Ganstat/Smeagle / Spartan Milf Community Manager - None Administrator - None Global Moderator - None Moderator - None Helper - None [/center][/spoiler]
[font=comic sans ms][size=12pt]Credits[/size][/font] [spoiler][center]Eazy (Rune-Server) and whoever worked on Project-OS[/center][/spoiler]

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

The pictures on this thread aren’t working. And the forums don’t seem to be too bad, nice well rounded-starting theme I suppose (even though it’s overused as Hell). I wish the best of luck!
